results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ሙሳንም ከእርሱ ገር ያሉትንም ሰዎች ሁሉንም አዳን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በዚህ ውስጥ ታላቅ ታምር አለበት፡፡ አብዛኞቻቸውም አማኞች አልነበሩም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
